title.rendered: “IDF Targets Hezbollah Infrastructure: Detailed Report on Recent Airstrikes in Southern Lebanon”

content.rendered:
IDF Spokesperson:

The IDF attacked military buildings, terrorist infrastructure, and a Hezbollah observation post in southern Lebanon.

Fighter jets and aircraft of the Air Force attacked several military buildings and terrorist infrastructure of the terrorist organization Hezbollah in the Kfar Kila, Maroun al-Ras, and Markaba areas in southern Lebanon in the last few hours. In addition, an observation post of the organization in the area of ​​Al-Mutamorra was attacked.

IDF forces conducted shooting today to remove threats in the areas of Aita al-Shaab and Al-Tzawna.

Attached are documentation of IDF attacks in southern Lebanon in the past few hours: https://bit.ly/3vTSX56
